title: CITD Notification 2025 - Walk-in interview for 02 Faculty Posts
description: The Central Institute of Tool Design (CITD) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 Faculty Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech and M.Sc. can apply for the CITD Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection pro...
